resources.string: App by Timofey Chernikov.\nIf you found some bugs in my app, please email me : orventro@gmail.com \nApplication uses muParser C++ library to parse expressions.
If you think you got not all roots, try to increase this parameter. Increasing this parameter increases solving time exponentially, so be careful.
No roots are found. If you think there are should be roots, try to increase accuracy in settings.
